title: Fizz is always banned
body: I just bought Fizz and i dont like to play blind, so in draft its impossible, in 12 hours of gameplay i only got one game with no fizz ban. You can counter him easily, why is he always banned?

replies.body: Because he's irritating even when perfectly balanced, like he has been.
You can't counter a champion who engages with his Q and as soon as you try to attack him he presses E so when he lands he slows you that way you can't even touch him unless you flash.
Troll pole. Damage. Ult. Not sure about others but those are what I dont like about him. Mainly the troll pole
He is fucking irritating plus annoying and generally "unfun" to play against.
He rather aggravating to play against so many prefer not having to.
People don't like him, just like yasuo

His e is one of his biggest problems. It's not op it's just unfun to play against. Frankly I think there should be no ability that has both a dash or blink with untargetability. It's frustrating knowing that you can't kite that. Maybe fizz's e can just make him untargetable while walking. Kind of like an untargetable version of Twitch's q without stealth. Admittedly I'm not a fizz main but I can guarantee you my idea would at least be less frustrating.
I don't like him having the dmg to kill me at level 3, or  almost 100-0ing me with only his ult.

If he killed you at level 3, you weren't full health or you were playing like a reckless idiot.

He can't ever do that with ult in a realistic situation.

Fizz is one of the most  stupid champs in this game because his spells are just 2 op. q=2 much dmg coming on to u, w insane dmg after one aa, e dodgin everything and being on the air and then  making so  much dmg when falling and finally r  just 2 much dmg slow and airborne

Same reason why yasuo is banned


although another big reason he is banned ( atleast in higher elo ATM IIRC) is that his top lane tank build is coming back again.
